scripts.release:mac: npm run build && cp main.js package.json dist && electron-packager dist --overwrite --arch=x64 --prune=true --icon=public/icon.icns --out=release
scripts.release:win: npm run build && cp main.js package.json dist && electron-packager dist --overwrite --arch=x64 --prune=true --icon=public/icon.ico --out=release
scripts.release:linux: npm run build && cp main.js package.json dist && electron-packager dist --overwrite --arch=x64 --prune=true --out=release && ./post-release-linux.sh
